title: 2 arrested in Easter fatal shooting of 3-year-old
content:
Two suspects in the Easter morning homicide of 3-year-old girl on Detroit’s west side have been arrested, Officer Jennifer Moreno of the Detroit Police Department confirmed Thursday.
Anaiya Denise Montgomery died of multiple gunshot wounds, according to the Wayne County medical examiner.
One suspect is a 26-year-old man; the other is a 20-year-old man. Details on how they were arrested were not yet available.
The arrests were made two days before Montgomery’s funeral, which will be held Saturday at Kadesh Baptist Church.
